history.proof: intros a b p q HltT. unfold pluspf. rewrite plusP_inv1 with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q). - shelve. - shelve. - shelve.

ctx: intros a b p q HltT.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) HltT : ltT (A:=A) ltM a b Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1846 (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1845 ?M1847) ?M1848)) (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1845 ?M1847) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1846 ?M1848))" with "pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a0 : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p, q)) (snd (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p, q)) a0) (plusp (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p, q))) = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))".

ctx: intros a b p q HltT.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM a b -> pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q) = pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
pluspf = fun l1 l2 : list (Term A n) => projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (l1, l2)) (snd (l1, l2)) a) (plusp (l1, l2)) : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) Arguments pluspf (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
pX : forall (A : Type) (n : nat), Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n)
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
ltT : forall (A : Type) (n : nat), (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
ssrbool.is_inleft : ?A + {?B} -> bool where ?A : [A : Type A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
ltP_refl_pX : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
nzeroP_multTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b

ltP_pX_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
eqp_imp_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
plusP_inv2 : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q s : list (Term A n)), plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) s -> ltT (A:=A) ltM a b -> s = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q)
pluspf_inv1_eq : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)) = pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)

plusP_inv3b : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q s : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) -> plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) s -> s = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) (pluspf p q)
pluspf_inv3a : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) -> eqP A eqA n (pluspf p q) (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))
ltT_dec : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> forall x y : Term A n, {ltT (A:=A) ltM x y} + {ltT (A:=A) ltM y x} + {eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) x y}
plusP_inv1 : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q s : list (Term A n)), plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) s -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> s = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))
ltP_order_comp : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a b c : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltP (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q) -> ltT (A:=A) ltM a c -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b c
canonical_pX_eqT : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a b : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p)
pluspf_inv3b : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) -> eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) (pluspf p q)) (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))
pluspf_inv2 : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM a b -> eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q)) (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))
nzeroP_comp_eqTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
eqp_eqTerm : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b
pluspf_inv1 : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))) (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))

canonical_cons : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l))
divA_is_multA : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b)
eqp_inv3r : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> eqP A eqA n p q
zeroP_dec : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (x : Term A n), {zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x} + {~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x}
moreCoefStructure.divA_A0_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a : A) (nZa : ~ eqA a A0), eqA (divA A0 a nZa) A0
divA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c0 d : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0) (nZd : ~ eqA d A0), eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c0 d nZd)
eqTerm_dec : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (x y : Term A n), {eqTerm eqA (n:=n) x y} + {~ eqTerm eqA (n:=n) x y}
olist_imp_olist : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l)) -> olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l)
canonical_ltT : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM (l ++ pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (pO A n))) -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b a
canonical_pX_order : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l)) -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b a
divA_multA_comp_r : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c0 : A) (nZc : ~ eqA c0 A0), eqA (divA (multA a b) c0 nZc) (multA (divA a c0 nZc) b)
not_double_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), ~ canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p))
eqPf : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (pq : list (Term A n) * list (Term A n)), {eqP A eqA n (fst pq) (snd pq)} + {~ eqP A eqA n (fst pq) (snd pq)}
eqTerm_refl : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, reflexive (Term A n) (eqTerm eqA (n:=n))
eqp_refl : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, reflexive (list (Term A n)) (eqP A eqA n)
eqA_sym : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> symmetric A eqA
eqA_ref : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> reflexive A eqA

```coq
intros a b p q HltT.
unfold pluspf. rewrite plusP_inv1 with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q).
- apply pluspf_inv2. assumption.
- assumption.
```

original: intros a b p q HltT. unfold pluspf. rewrite plusP_inv1 with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q). - apply pluspf_inv2. auto. - auto.
